author: Tariq Harris
comment: There are so many fake profiles it is utter ridiculous. I get likes from at least two of them a day! This is a problem that has to be fixed. If you want to be constantly bothered by fake profiles; then by all means get this app. I even tried the paid version, it wasn't any better. This whole app might just be a scam.

author: Adam Bathon
comment: I enjoy the app BUT there are SO MANY FAKE ROBOTS who pretend to be military guys and they sound like they are from India the way they text. Why can't the developers do something to control this???? Even when I PAID for the app it didn't stop the robots. Really sad. Otherwise all the features are great unless a robot spammers starts messaging you like a stalker.

author: Austin Wilson
comment: I honestly was giving up on dating sites. Then I stumbled upon this miracle app. My hope and prayers were saved. Not only are you COMPLETELY , you also have access to guys that you are attracted toward. The team is very dedicated to Surge. They asked me personally how I felt about the app. They seriously care! Get this app!!!!!

author: Norm McGlone
comment: I'm not convinced this app wasn't developed by Nigerian scammers to run their "419" romance scams.  I experienced 11 attempts at various scams in my first week. This app is crawling with 'em.  Don't waste your time, though if you enjoy trolling these guys, this is the app for you.

author: James Barela
comment: Not the biggest fan of dating apps that only allow you to swipe left or right. It would be nice to be able to look people up by name and/or user name and be able to send instant messages to anyone instead of having to be a "match" etc.

author: Marble Blue
comment: It works well however the UI does feel slightly cluttered but it does offer the simplistics and lets you spdcify a lot of details well. The chat management is good as well, letting you send photos which can only be viewed once etc.

I don't mind the odd one or two. The development of an app takes time... and yes, that translates as money. But sheesh... really, soooo many?!?!?  I've had to install an adblocker they're so intrusive!!! Wind it back a notch or two and I'll update the rating. It's a great app, it really is ... but crikey!

author: Mark Jones
comment: I'm still debating about this app   even reading the other reviews...i think those reviews seem staged....im skeptical...i..had settings for matches within approx 50km and it's giving me ppl 1000kms away...i feel like there are fake profiles here. I don't think I've had a substantive conversation with more than 1 person...the one person who seemed real

author: Robert Hope
comment: Only downloaded  today and have had great feedback. It is not compacted user frindly. Guy I have chatted to so far have been well behaved. Will keep you posted on development's.  Thanks 😙

author: Eric Kristiansen
comment: Most apps with this structure just don't cut it, but Surge is refreshingly good.  The design layout has a nice color scheme, (yes that does make a difference) it's very easy to navigate and no hiccups or crashes either.

author: Brian Furst
comment: The app is nicely laid out. The only limitations so far is ease of communication unless you are a premium member. So if you just like to browse it's great, but if you see allot of potential, then you need to upgrade $$ to really utilize the app.

author: Nicholas Sommerby
comment: So far I'm enjoying it.  Like some apps, it requires a subscription some some of the more unique features (seeing who liked you without having to match with them, for example), but the free features are in well enough amount so that new members won't feel like they HAVE to pay to really use it.
Easy to use app, and there seems to be quite a few decent people on here, its great to move from the more common platforms to one ive never used before and i dont think ill look back. Great.

author: Ruben Hernandez
comment: I've only had the app a few days but so far I like it. Easy to use. OK looking people. Not mad lol

author: Apolo Agar
comment: Honestly, just by looking at reviews and images this app looks very good.  Yet I honestly think there should be a teenager section.  Us teens have no other way to meet execpt for sketchy sites or apps.  We need to get out there, especially when we are at our lowest.  I would give this app five stars if there was a teenager section.

author: mfiso mgomezulu
comment: Totally amazing, I mean you can see who likes you and it matches you up when it finds a perfect partner for you who is near your local , one of the best apps I've seen so far

author: Jae Lamar
comment: Still getting the hang of it but I haven't had any problems so far. I like it

author: nima shatta
comment: This app is a super very good.. I haven't  meet  any best app like this you guy need more then 5 stars
Haven't come across anything negative yet but it's my first time using this so I won't jinx my experience.

author: Lee J
comment: So far overall it's a great app to use, it definitely has a bigger selection of guy's than what other apps like grindr have to offer.. Simple to set up and easy to use.. I would definitely recommend this app to other single guy's that I know...

author: Ricardo Gomez
comment: This app is amazing, I feel safe in the environment which this app provides their administrators are super friendly and helpful and can help you with any situation, and yeah that's all I have to say about this app it's truly amazing.

author: Kevin Barr
comment: I really like this app.  Lots of  locals on here and you do get responses.  I had it for 2 days and actually got a date.  I recommend it.  Better than some of the big names for real people. Its easy and simple to use.

author: Dylan Masters
comment: It's a great app to find and connect with local guys. Whether your wanting to have more friends or possibly meet a future partner, or even just someone for the night.
It's all right for a dating app a lot better than the straight dating apps where u have fake profiles of people posing as being in the state's and dont

author: Itz slimfash morounkeji idris
comment: Infact I don't really know what to say, I love this app. Thanks for the admin I was able too make friends and hooks up with my kind .keep up the good work

author: Randal Van Nevel
comment: It is a nice app overall just needs to be worked out a bit more than normal apps because it limits you quick on what you can do.

author: Samuel Burgess
comment: It's great lot better then the others I have been on I would happy to say give it again I did wasn't sure about it until after play around with it know I am

author: Drake Hendeson
comment: Its a simple app that you just chat or for hook up purpose if both agree to. There's no bugs i have encounter yet just overall, 9.5/10

author: Rob J
comment: I'm enjoying the hot guys in my area in Zambia Cape town Asomeness and got a premium membership to try out. Thanks for awesome app.
Hands down, you blow GRINDR out of the water. User friendly with features that make navigation  convenient.

author: Liaw ysheng
comment: I think it an amazing app. It have the protection of my private life. Also it let me get to know some amazing guys of there
This is great app though I'm new for this app hope I can find my soulmate here.im tired already of being single.

author: K.L. Cornvius
comment: Easy to create profile and link accounts, w/option to link your music provider

author: Jon Long
comment: I really like this app better than the others. When I got started and needed assistance they were fast with a response . Great app

author: Anderson Nascimento
comment: É prático , fácil de usar e você tem mais "especiais" do que o app concorrente

author: Achmad Hermansyah
comment: It's a great app, its unique selective methods give u ways to meet people who have common interest

author: Kody Shierk
comment: So far I really dig this app! I've gotten a bunch of matches and I love that you can see who has liked you.

author: Gary Maddock
comment: I just installed this app. It seems very polished and well thought out. I would definitely recommend it to my friends.

author: William M
comment: Great place to meet people.  And the staff is very helpful if you have issues with the app.

author: Trés Pryor
comment: This is the dating app I've been waiting for. Easy to setup, easy to use and plenty of choices in my area.
